reviews.review:
Take this from someone who has around 1200 hours between the PC version and the console version. Don't get into this game. It will disappoint you at every turn. This game really has the potential to be something special, but the devs coast off of licenses instead of making improvements to the game. 

All you can expect for new content are several new perks, a new killer, and a new survivor model every few months which you all have to pay for. We don't even get new maps often anymore. When comparing this to other live service games that continually add free updates (and thus have a reason for cosmetic pricing ranges), it really is a sad comparison. The actual formula and gameplay for DbD has barely changed over the years. When Fortnite has a better Halloween event than a horror multiplayer game, there's a problem. 

I will gladly update my review to be positive if changes are made in the right direction, but until then I cannot recommend this game which hurts as a longtime horror fan.

Сделали из маньяков посмешище! Подкрутили выживших в тихоря без уведомлений! Сейчас любой ман слабы а система ранго конечно помогла в быстром нахождении сурвов но завод геников теперь намного быстрее! Катка длится от силу мин 5-7 если даже постараться! Короче говоря дбд потеряла идею, сурвы должны бояться манов а не наоборот!

Jogo simplesmente é extremamente fácil pra survival, conteudo infinito para parar o killer, estrategias infinitas para counterar play e simplesmente se ficar dificil é só chamar os amigos pra jogar junto em pt no discord ou em outro meio de audio pra coordenar melhor a partida e fazer o que quiser, afinal, de survival vc joga em 4, já o killer n tem com quem entrar em call.

Além do mais, para se tornar o killer imparável é necessário ou muitas e muitas horas de experiência ao ponto de você saber cada mapa de cor ou você pode simplesmenter ter gastado essas mesmas horas para desbloquear várias perks que reduzem (não nulificam de nenhuma forma) a estratégia dos survivors.

Jogo muito bom, porém, não é recomendável já que só 1 lado do jogo tem um potencial de se divertir, enquanto o outro ou tem uma partida extremamente fácil pois os survivors são ruins ou simplesmente é loopado em toda e qualquer forma de estratégia quando os survivors são muito bons, 0 de balanceamento, 3/10.

if you want to play a game that's well polished and works in the way you'd expect it to, you'd be better off looking for something else.

i have played this game for nearly 9-10 months and it has gotten progressively worse since i bought it.

when i play killer, there's sound bugs, i freeze whenever an action is performed and the game runs very poorly. on other games i can average between 150-250 fps yet on dead by daylight it can barely scrape 60 fps. my condolences to any console players that put up with this shit

when i play survivor i notice the bugs less because i am playing with friends and likely joking around, but the same issues exist. not being able to hear myself repairing gens, huge freezes whenever a gen is completed/ when an event happens and poorly optimised gameplay make the only redeeming quality of the game the fact that i can play it with my friends.

alongside this, the developers are not free from controversy what with the NFT bs with the hellraiser chapter and their genuine disconnect to the fact that their game can be broken as shit sometimes

no other multiplayer game of this size that i know of has this many issues and its just a bit disheartening, because i used to really love playing this game - and used to play it a lot when i first got it

i hope that in future they can roll patches that will make the game not-so-ass and actually run properly at a decent framerate, but until then i highly encourage new players to put their time and money elsewhere

Игра багованная, разрабы с 2016 не могут починить скилчеки, чтобы они не взрывали генератор если они еще не появились. Постоянные вылеты, предметы унесенные из матча не добавляются в инвентарь, постоянно выкидывает при загрузке. Типичная, маленькая индикомпания запилила свой маленький проект на кикстартере.

I wouldn't buy it. The state of the game these days is an abysmal, almost laughable deluge of bugs, and bad practice. It's a very bad thing when you can tell the revenue per cosmetic/licensed character purchase matters more to a company than the performance of their game. With every update, dlc launch, or hotfix, one thing gets fixed and two more break. It is ridiculous.

Although,

The game is very fun, don't get me wrong. It has an addicting air to it when you do well, and although the community seems to be split down the middle of either fairly pleasant people, and less than, you find some really fun people to play with. There's plenty of discussion on the subreddit, and amidst the fervent DBD scene on YouTube. 

Both killer and survivor are incredible, polarizing experiences. One of the only values for your money is the deep and complex playstyles that survivor and killer have to offer. There is a countless number of perks between both roles, some stronger than others, and some offering entirely different playstyles than what may be at face value. 

Nine times out of ten, no two matches are the same. The balancing of this game is rough, and a lot of the time, exploits and tactics used by killers that are regarded as "scummy" are utilised to win. Generally speaking, these exploits are to the fault of basic game design, which makes it hard to balance out and fix much of what the community is complaining about (i.e. farming, camping).

With all that being said, however, I wouldn't recommend buying it, not even on sale. Aside from the recent drama surrounding bhvr's use of NFTs, this game is built bad. Every match I play, I lag. This has gotten me killed, or made me lose kills. Textures often look smeared and weird, solely unjust of spending any money on any of the cosmetics alone. Certain maps and perks (you might be paying for, by the way) tend to get disabled every other week.

There are other games for more of your dollar value that look, play, and operate better, that were made decades before this one. Don't buy this.

Let's settle the debate:

Devs make the game so that the survivors have the highest chance of winning possible regardless of survivor or killer skill level. I play both survivor and killer equally, so no, I am not biased. 

Survivors are made blatantly to be able to ALMOST instantly heal/recover from any type of killer attack or ability, and the maps each have easily 45 vaults/pallets/wood doors/loop spots collectively (not each). They are made stupid op if  you have half a braincell and either sneak the whole time, generator rush or have a flash light. 

Killers are made deliberately to be weak and slow. Since the game came out (I played since launch on PS4) the killers speed, bloodlust. abilities, perks and addons have been nerfed into a comical level of uselessness. Hooks can be wiped out with ease, and with survivors body blocking and being able to hook from moderate distances and any angle, and being entirely invulnerable while unhooking, even hook camping is barely plausible unless you use leatherface's chainsaw. Playing killer is only worth it and fun if you get really bad survivors and entirely don't care about playing the game.

Basically, the whole killer aspect of the game may as well be removed and replaced with the god awful killer tutorial AI, rendering 1/3rd of the games content useless, as the other 2/3rd is just survivors and their cosmetics. This is the reasoning for a bad review.
